D

describedAs(String) - Method in class MicroOptions.Option
Provides a human-readable description for this option.

G

getArg(String) - Method in class MicroOptions
Returns the argument that was associated with the specified option.
getArg(String, String) - Method in class MicroOptions
Returns the argument that was associated with the specified option, or the specified default value.

H

has(String) - Method in class MicroOptions
Returns true iff the specified option was encountered during parsing.

I

isRequired() - Method in class MicroOptions.Option
Specifies that this option is required.
isUnary() - Method in class MicroOptions.Option
Specifies that this option takes no arguments.

M

MicroOptions - Class in <Unnamed>
A simple class for configuring and parsing command-line options.
MicroOptions() - Constructor for class MicroOptions
Creates an initially-empty set of options.
MicroOptions.MissingArgException - Exception in <Unnamed>
Thrown when the parser can't find the argument for a non-unary option.
MicroOptions.MissingArgException(String) - Constructor for exception MicroOptions.MissingArgException
 
MicroOptions.Option - Class in <Unnamed>
Core class for defining options using builder-style methods.
MicroOptions.OptionException - Exception in <Unnamed>
All option-related exceptions are instances of this base class.
MicroOptions.OptionException(String) - Constructor for exception MicroOptions.OptionException
 
MicroOptions.RequiredOptionException - Exception in <Unnamed>
Thrown when the parser can't find a required option.
MicroOptions.RequiredOptionException(String) - Constructor for exception MicroOptions.RequiredOptionException
 
MicroOptions.UnsupportedOptionException - Exception in <Unnamed>
Thrown when the parser encounters an option that has not been defined.
MicroOptions.UnsupportedOptionException(String) - Constructor for exception MicroOptions.UnsupportedOptionException
 

O

option(String) - Method in class MicroOptions
Configure an optional, no-arg option having the specified name.

P

parse(String...) - Method in class MicroOptions
Parses the specified array of Strings and populates values for all configured options.

U

usageString() - Method in class MicroOptions
